attach packages
```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(DT)
```

make an interactive graph of iris data
```{r}
iris_graph <- ggplot(iris, aes(x = Petal.Width, y = Petal.Length))+
  geom_point(aes(size = Sepal.Width,
                 color = Species))+
  labs(x = "Petal width (cm)", y = "Petal length (cm)", title = "Iris metrics")

iris_graph

ggplotly(iris_graph)

```
